  • Public Health
Public Health
Converse County Public Health
255 N Russell
Douglas, WY 82633
PH (307) 358-2536
Fax (307) 358-3941
Glenrock Office: (307)436-3474

Family Planning Services
  • Annual Exams (all ages)
  • Birth Control Prescriptions
  • STD Testing and Treatment(male and female)
  • Emergency Contraception

Communicable Disease Program
  • Immunizations for infants, children and adults
  • Flu and Pneumonia
  • HIV Testing and Counseling
  • Sexually transmitted disease education, monitoring, testing and treatment
  • Disease outbreak investigation and tracking
  • Rapid Strep Testing
  • Ear, hair, and skin checks

Maternal Child Health
  • High risk maternal and newborn program
  • Best Beginnings for Wyoming Babies
  • Home visiting for pregnant and parenting families
  • Children's Special Health Services Care Coordination
  • New baby and mom Welcome Home Visits
  • Breastfeeding education, evaluation, and support system with a Lactation Counselor
  • Newborn/infant wellness education and monitoring
  • Newborn and Child weight checks
  • Childbirth Classes/Breastfeeding Classes
  • Infant, toddler, child nutrition counseling
  • Pregnancy testing and counseling

Adult Health
  • Blood Pressure screening and monitoring (all ages)
  • Includes communication with personal physician
  • Functional assessment for nursing home placement and home care
  • Diabetic Support Groups at Glenrock Senior Center
  • Adult weight and height checks

General Services
  • Community Health Assessment and Planning
  • Coordination with other community service agencies and providers

Public Health Response
  • Emergency Preparedness
All services are confidential and provided regardless of race, religion, age, or disability. Services are low cost or free. Please call if you have any questions about the services offered.

107 No. 5th St., Suite 114 - Douglas, WY 82633-2448 - (307) 358-2244
Lucile.Taylor@conversecountywy.gov
